parameters.name: NameSpaceShortId
parameters.description: The short ID of the namespace. You do not need to specify a region ID. The value of this parameter can be up to 20 characters in length and can contain only lowercase letters and digits.

parameters.name: NamespaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace. The information about the default namespace cannot be queried or modified. The default namespace cannot be deleted.
